description: This feature allows users to add a holiday with name and date and verify the outcomes.

steps.name: Given  the user navigates to the Save Holidays page
When  the user enters holiday details with name "New Year" and date "2030-01-10"
And  the user clicks on the "Save" button
Then  the user should see a success message "Successfully Saved"
